contentList.content: Grants an additional 1 <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> per level.
Immune to Magic Missile. <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is increased by [1].

When you are about to be hit by an enemy, increase your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1]. You take no damage from <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
Casting this spell using a 3rd or 4th level spell slot will increase the bonus to [1], and a 5th or 6th level spell slot will increase it to [2].
Conjure [2] magical berries into your or a companion's inventory. Creatures who eat a berry regain [1]. Berries disappear after Long Rest.
Casting this spell using a 5th or 6th level spell slot will increase the bonus to [1].
